languages.text: Из техотсека поступают сотни отчаянных сигналов о помощи, не получивших ответа ранее: когда машины вышли из-под контроля и начали сводить людей с ума, те, повинуясь какой-то злой и параноидальной логике, бросились уничтожать служителей Адептус Механикус. Техножрецы несут большие потери, однако остатки культа еще держат оборону. Из всего, что происходит на корабле, ситуация в техотсеке — самая сложная.

traits.locale_text: Из техотсека поступают сотни сигналов о помощи: когда машины вышли из-под контроля и начали сводить людей с ума, начались гонения на служителей Адептус Механикус. Техножрецы несут большие потери, однако остатки культа еще держат оборону.

languages.text: The maintenance bay is sending out hundreds of desperate distress calls that have gone unanswered up to now — when the machines went out of control and started turning people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance bay is the direst.
languages.original_text: Из техотсека поступают сотни отчаянных сигналов о помощи, не получивших ответа ранее: когда машины вышли из-под контроля и начали сводить людей с ума, те, повинуясь какой-то злой и параноидальной логике, бросились уничтожать служителей Адептус Механикус. Техножрецы несут большие потери, однако остатки культа еще держат оборону. Из всего, что происходит на корабле, ситуация в техотсеке — самая сложная.

traits.locale_text: The maintenance module is sending hundreds of desperate distress calls, which remained unanswered earlier — when the machines went out of control and started driving people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the Cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance module is the direst.

The maintenance module is sending hundreds of desperate distress calls, which remained unanswered earlier — when the machines went out of control and started driving people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the Cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance module is the direst.

The maintenance module is sending out hundreds of desperate distress calls that have gone unanswered up to now — when the machines went out of control and started turning people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance module is the direst.

The maintenance module is sending out hundreds of desperate distress calls that have gone unanswered up to now — when the machines went out of control and started turning people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance module is the direst.

The maintenance bay is sending out hundreds of desperate distress calls that have gone unanswered up to now — when the machines went out of control and started turning people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance bay is the direst.

languages.text: La bahía de mantenimiento está emitiendo cientos de llamadas de socorro desesperadas que hasta ahora han quedado desatendidas. Cuando las máquinas se han descontrolado y han empezado a hacer enloquecer a la gente, otras personas, presas de la paranoia y el odio, han empezado a masacrar a los siervos del Adeptus Mechanicus. Los tecnosacerdotes han sufrido numerosas bajas, pero los que quedan aún resisten. De todos los problemas de la nave, los de la bahía de mantenimiento son los más acuciantes.
languages.original_text: The maintenance bay is sending out hundreds of desperate distress calls that have gone unanswered up to now — when the machines went out of control and started turning people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance bay is the direst.

traits.locale_text: El módulo de mantenimiento está emitiendo cientos de llamadas de socorro desesperadas que hasta ahora han quedado desatendidas. Cuando las máquinas se han descontrolado y han empezado a hacer enloquecer a la gente, otras personas presas de la paranoia y el odio han empezado a masacrar a los siervos del Adeptus Mechanicus. Los tecnosacerdotes han sufrido numerosas bajas, pero los que quedan aún resisten. De todas los problemas de la nave, los del módulo de mantenimiento son los más acuciantes.

languages.text: 维护甲板发出了数百个绝望的求救信号，这些信号直到现在都没有得到回应。部分机器失去控制，摧毁了船员的理智，而另一部分机器在充满仇恨与偏执的逻辑驱使之下，开始屠杀机械修会的成员。技术神甫们遭受了惨重的伤亡，但残存的成员依然在坚守阵地。在舰船上发生的所有事故之中，维护甲板的情况是最危急的。
languages.original_text: The maintenance bay is sending out hundreds of desperate distress calls that have gone unanswered up to now — when the machines went out of control and started turning people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance bay is the direst.

traits.locale_text: 维护区域正在发出数百个绝望的求救信号，这些信号直到现在都没有得到回应。部分机器失去控制，摧毁了船员的理智，而另一部分机器在充满仇恨与偏执的逻辑驱使之下，开始屠杀机械修会的成员。技术祭司们遭受了惨重的伤亡，但残存的成员依然在坚守阵地。在舰船上发生的所有事故之中，维护区域的情况是最危急的。

languages.text: これまで応答がなかったメンテナンスベイは、何百件もの必死の救難信号を発信している。機械が制御不能になり人々を狂わせ始める。憎しみに飲まれて偏った考え方に突き動かされた者たちが、帝国技術局の従者達を駆逐し始めた。技術司祭は大きな損失を被ったが、教団の残党が変わらず戦線に立っている。船内で起こっているあらゆる事の中で、メンテナンスベイの状況が一番ひどい。
languages.original_text: The maintenance bay is sending out hundreds of desperate distress calls that have gone unanswered up to now — when the machines went out of control and started turning people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance bay is the direst.

traits.locale_text: これまで応答がなかったメンテナンスベイは、何百件もの必死の救難信号を発信している。機械が制御不能になり人々を狂わせ始める。憎しみに飲まれて偏った考え方に突き動かされた者たちが、帝国技術局の従者達を駆逐し始めた。技術司祭は大きな損失を被ったが、教団の残党が変わらず戦線に立っている。船内で起こっているあらゆる事の中で、メンテナンスベイの状況が一番ひどい。

languages.text: Die Wartungsbucht hat Hunderte verzweifelte Notsignale gesendet, die bis jetzt unbeantwortet geblieben sind – als die Maschinen außer Kontrolle gerieten und Menschen wahnsinnig machten, begannen andere, getrieben von Hass und paranoider Logik, die Diener des Adeptus Mechanicus abzuschlachten. Die Techpriester haben schwere Verluste erlitten, aber die Überreste des Kults halten nach wie vor die Stellung. In Anbetracht sämtlicher Vorfälle auf dem Schiff ist die Lage in der Wartungsbucht am kritischsten.
languages.original_text: The maintenance bay is sending out hundreds of desperate distress calls that have gone unanswered up to now — when the machines went out of control and started turning people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance bay is the direst.

languages.text: La baie de maintenance envoie des centaines d'appels de détresse désespérés qui sont restés sans réponse jusqu'à présent. Lorsque les machines détraquées ont commencé à rendre l'équipage fou, certains de ceux qui avaient échappé à leur influence se sont mis à massacrer les serviteurs de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, poussés par une logique haineuse et paranoïaque. Malgré les lourdes pertes qu'ils ont subies, les technoprêtres continuent à lutter. Dans cette crise que traverse le vaisseau, il est évident que cette baie a le plus urgemment besoin d'aide.
languages.original_text: The maintenance bay is sending out hundreds of desperate distress calls that have gone unanswered up to now — when the machines went out of control and started turning people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance bay is the direst.

traits.locale_text: Le module de maintenance envoie des centaines d'appels de détresse désespérés qui sont restés sans réponse jusqu'à présent. Lorsque les machines détraquées ont commencé à rendre l'équipage fou, certains de ceux qui avaient échappé à leur influence se sont mis à massacrer les serviteurs de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, poussés par une logique haineuse et paranoïaque. Malgré les lourdes pertes qu'ils ont subies, les technoprêtres continuent à lutter. Dans cette crise que traverse le vaisseau, il est évident que ce module a le plus urgemment besoin d'aide.

languages.text: Bakım bölmesinden, şimdiye kadar cevapsız kalan yüzlerce umutsuz yardım çağrısı geliyor. Makineler kontrolden çıkıp insanları çıldırtmaya başlayınca, nefret dolu ve paranoyak bir mantıkla hareket eden bir kesim de Adeptus Mechanicus hizmetkârlarını katletmeye girişmiş. Tekno Rahipler ağır kayıplar verse de sağ kalan tarikatçılar hâlâ hattı tutuyor. Gemide olup biten onca şey içinde en kötü durumdaki yer, bakım bölmesi.
languages.original_text: The maintenance bay is sending out hundreds of desperate distress calls that have gone unanswered up to now — when the machines went out of control and started turning people insane, others, driven by some hateful and paranoid logic, started butchering the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Tech-Priests have sustained heavy losses, but the remains of the cult are still holding the line. Out of everything that's happening on the ship, the situation in the maintenance bay is the direst.

traits.locale_text: Bakım bölmesinden, şimdiye kadar cevapsız kalan yüzlerce umutsuz yardım çağrısı geliyor. Makineler kontrolden çıkıp insanları çıldırtmaya başladığında, nefret dolu ve paranoyak bir mantıkla hareket eden bir kesim Adeptus Mechanicus hizmetkârlarını katletmeye başladı. Tekno Rahipler ağır kayıplar verdi lakin tarikatın kalanı hâlâ hattı tutuyor. Gemide olup biten onca şey içinde en kötü durumdaki yer bakım bölmesi.
